title: 静夜思
author: 李白
content:
床前明月光，疑是地上霜。
举头望明月，低头思故乡。
translation:
Bright moonlight before my bed,
Perhaps frost on the ground.
I lift my head to view the moon,
Then lower it, missing my hometown.

title: 春晓
author: 孟浩然
content:
春眠不觉晓，处处闻啼鸟。
夜来风雨声，花落知多少。
translation:
Spring sleep unnoticed dawn,
Everywhere birds sing.
Last night's wind and rain,
Who knows how many flowers fell?

title: 登鹳雀楼
author: 王之涣
content:
白日依山尽，黄河入海流。
欲穷千里目，更上一层楼。
translation:
The sun along the mountain bows;
The Yellow River seawards flows.
You will enjoy a grander sight,
If you climb to a greater height.

title: 相思
author: 王维
content:
红豆生南国，春来发几枝。
愿君多采撷，此物最相思。
translation:
Red berries grow in southern land,
How many load in spring the trees?
Gather them till full is your hand;
They would revive fond memories.

title: 江雪
author: 柳宗元
content:
千山鸟飞绝，万径人踪灭。
孤舟蓑笠翁，独钓寒江雪。
translation:
From hill to hill no bird in flight,
From path to path no man in sight.
A lonely fisherman afloat,
Is fishing snow in lonely boat.

title: 望庐山瀑布
author: 李白
content:
日照香炉生紫烟，遥看瀑布挂前川。
飞流直下三千尺，疑是银河落九天。
translation:
The sunlit Censer Peak exhales incenselike cloud;
Like an upended stream the cataract sounds loud.
Its torrent dashes down three thousand feet from high,
As if the Silver River fell from the blue sky.

title: 早发白帝城
author: 李白
content:
朝辞白帝彩云间，千里江陵一日还。
两岸猿声啼不住，轻舟已过万重山。
translation:
Leaving at dawn the White Emperor crowned with cloud,
I've sailed a thousand miles through canyons in a day.
With monkeys' sad adieus the riverbanks are loud;
My skiff has left ten thousand mountains far away.

title: 黄鹤楼送孟浩然之广陵
titlePinyin: Huáng Hè Lóu Sòng Mèng Hàorán Zhī Guǎnglíng
titleEnglish: Seeing Meng Haoran Off from Yellow Crane Tower
author: 李白
content:
故人西辞黄鹤楼，烟花三月下扬州。
孤帆远影碧空尽，唯见长江天际流。
translation:
My friend has left the west where the Yellow Crane towers,
For River Town veiled in green willows and red flowers.
His lessening sail is lost in the boundless blue sky,
Where I see but the endless River rolling by.

title: 枫桥夜泊
titleEnglish: Mooring at Maple Bridge at Night
author: 张继
content:
月落乌啼霜满天，江枫渔火对愁眠。
姑苏城外寒山寺，夜半钟声到客船。
translation:
At moonset cry the crows, streaking the frosty sky;
Dimly lit fishing boats 'neath maples sadly lie.
Beyond the city wall, from Temple of Cold Hill,
Bells break the ship-borne roamer's dream and midnight still.

title: 凉州词
author: 王之涣
content:
黄河远上白云间，一片孤城万仞山。
羌笛何须怨杨柳，春风不度玉门关。
translation:
The Yellow River rises to the white cloud;
The lonely town is lost amid the mountains proud.
Why should the Mongol flute complain no willows grow?
Beyond the Gate of Jade no vernal wind will blow.

title: 悯农
author: 李绅
content:
锄禾日当午，汗滴禾下土。
谁知盘中餐，粒粒皆辛苦。
translation:
Hoing millet in mid-day heat,
Sweat dripping to the earth beneath:
Do you know the food on your plate,
Every grain was hard-earned?

title: 游子吟
author: 孟郊
content:
慈母手中线，游子身上衣。
临行密密缝，意恐迟迟归。
谁言寸草心，报得三春晖。
translation:
From the threads a mother's hand weaves,
A gown for parting son is made,
Sewn stitch by stitch before he leaves,
For fear his return be delayed.
Such kindness as young grass receives,
From the warm sun can be repaid?

title: 清明
author: 杜牧
content:
清明时节雨纷纷，路上行人欲断魂。
借问酒家何处有，牧童遥指杏花村。
translation:
A drizzling rain falls like tears on the Mourning Day;
The mourner's heart is breaking on his way.
Where can a wineshop be found to drown his sadness?
A cowherd points to Almond Flower Village in the distance.

title: 山行
author: 杜牧
content:
远上寒山石径斜，白云生处有人家。
停车坐爱枫林晚，霜叶红于二月花。
translation:
On the cold mountain the stone path slants afar;
Where white clouds rise there appears a cottage.
I stop my cart, charmed by maple trees at nightfall,
Whose frost-bitten leaves are redder than spring flowers.

title: 乐游原
author: 李商隐
content:
向晚意不适，驱车登古原。
夕阳无限好，只是近黄昏。
translation:
At dusk my heart is filled with gloom;
I drive my cab to ancient tomb.
The setting sun seems so sublime,
But it is near its dying time.

title: 鹿柴
author: 王维
content:
空山不见人，但闻人语响。
返景入深林，复照青苔上。
translation:
In empty hills no man is seen,
But human voices echo.
Sunbeams pierce the gloomy wood,
And shine upon the moss green.

title: 九月九日忆山东兄弟
titlePinyin: Jiǔ Yuè Jiǔ Rì Yì Shān Dōng Xiōng Dì
titleEnglish: Thinking of My Brothers on Double Ninth
author: 王维
content:
独在异乡为异客，每逢佳节倍思亲。
遥知兄弟登高处，遍插茱萸少一人。
translation:
Alone, a lonely stranger in a foreign land,
I pine for my family doubly on holiday.
I know my brothers would, with dogwood spray in hand,
Climb up the mountain and miss me so far away.

title: 望天门山
author: 李白
content:
天门中断楚江开，碧水东流至此回。
两岸青山相对出，孤帆一片日边来。

title: 赠汪伦
author: 李白
content:
李白乘舟将欲行，忽闻岸上踏歌声。
桃花潭水深千尺，不及汪伦送我情。
translation:
I, Li Bai, sit aboard a ship about to go,
When suddenly on shore your farewell songs o'erflow.
However deep the Lake of Peach Blossoms may be,
It's not so deep, O Wang Lun! as your love for me.

title: 出塞
author: 王昌龄
content:
秦时明月汉时关，万里长征人未还。
但使龙城飞将在，不教胡马度阴山。
translation:
The moon still shines on mountain passes as of yore.
How many guardsmen of the Great Wall are no more!
If the flying general were still there in command,
No hostile steeds would have dared to invade our land.

title: 登高
author: 杜甫
content:
风急天高猿啸哀，渚清沙白鸟飞回。
无边落木萧萧下，不尽长江滚滚来。
万里悲秋常作客，百年多病独登台。
艰难苦恨繁霜鬓，潦倒新停浊酒杯。
translation:
Wind swift, sky high, apes wail mournfully;
Clear isles, white sand, birds circle gracefully.
Boundless leaves rustle, falling far and near;
Endless Yangtze waves roll on forever.
Wandering sad through autumn's thousand li,
Alone I climb, ill through the years, sigh wearily.
Hardship has frosted my temples with pain,
Frustrated, I quit the cup that brought no gain.

title: 春望
author: 杜甫
content:
国破山河在，城春草木深。
感时花溅泪，恨别鸟惊心。
烽火连三月，家书抵万金。
白头搔更短，浑欲不胜簪。

title: 赋得古原草送别
titlePinyin: Fù Dé Gǔ Yuán Cǎo Sòng Bié
author: 白居易
content:
离离原上草，一岁一枯荣。
野火烧不尽，春风吹又生。
远芳侵古道，晴翠接荒城。
又送王孙去，萋萋满别情。
translation:
Luxuriant grass on the ancient plain,
Flourishing yearly, then withering again.
Wildfires can't burn it all away;
Spring breezes revive it day by day.
Its fragrance spreads on old pathways worn,
Emerald hues touch the ruined town forlorn.
Again I see my friend depart,
Lush growth mirrors the sorrow in my heart.

title: 夜雨寄北
titleEnglish: Night Rain: A Letter to the North
author: 李商隐
content:
君问归期未有期，巴山夜雨涨秋池。
何当共剪西窗烛，却话巴山夜雨时。
translation:
You ask when I'll return - no date is set;
Night rains on Mount Ba fill autumn's pond yet.
When shall we trim the wick by west window light,
And speak of this rainy Ba mountain night?

title: 十五从军征
author: Anonymous
content:
十五从军征，八十始得归。
道逢乡里人，家中有阿谁？
遥望是君家，松柏冢累累。
translation:
At fifteen I marched off to war,
At eighty, finally home once more.
Meeting a villager on the way,
'Who's left in my house?' I ask to pray.
'Look yonder where pines and graves stay,
That cluster of tombs marks your home today.'

title: 孔雀东南飞
author: Anonymous
content:
孔雀东南飞，五里一徘徊。
十三能织素，十四学裁衣。
十五弹箜篌，十六诵诗书。
translation:
The peacock southeast flew,
Each five miles paused to rue.
At thirteen, silk I'd weave,
At fourteen, clothes conceive.
At fifteen, harp I'd play,
At sixteen, books held sway.

title: 东门行
titleEnglish: The Ballad of the East Gate
author: Anonymous
content:
出东门，不顾归。
来入门，怅欲悲。
盎中无斗米储，还视架上无悬衣。
translation:
Through East Gate I strode, no thought of return,
Re-entering home, sorrows burn.
No rice in jars, no clothes on the rack,
Empty walls mirror the life we lack.

title: 孤儿行
author: Anonymous
content:
孤儿生，孤子遇生，命独当苦。
父母在时，乘坚车，驾驷马。
父母已去，兄嫂令我行贾。
translation:
Born an orphan, fate's cruel hand,
Life's bitterness I withstand.
When parents lived, fine carriages rode,
Four-horse chariots on the road.
Now they're gone, to trade I'm told,
By brother's wife, for silver and gold.

title: 念奴娇·赤壁怀古
titlePinyin: Niàn Nú Jiāo·Chì Bì Huái Gǔ
titleEnglish: Remembering the Past at Red Cliff
author: 苏轼
content:
大江东去，浪淘尽，千古风流人物。
故垒西边，人道是，三国周郎赤壁。
乱石穿空，惊涛拍岸，卷起千堆雪。
江山如画，一时多少豪杰。
translation:
Eastward the Great River flows,
Washing away heroes of old.
West of the ancient fortress lies,
Red Cliff where Zhou Yu won battles bold.
Jagged rocks pierce clouds on high,
Fierce waves beat the shore nearby,
Churning snow-white foam to the sky.
This riverscape, a painting divine,
How many heroes once did shine!

title: 声声慢·寻寻觅觅
titlePinyin: Shēng Shēng Màn·Xún Xún Mì Mì
author: 李清照
content:
寻寻觅觅，冷冷清清，凄凄惨惨戚戚。
乍暖还寒时候，最难将息。
三杯两盏淡酒，怎敌他、晚来风急！
translation:
Seeking, searching, lonely and bleak,
Chilly, quiet, sorrows peak.
Warmth then cold - this season's strain,
Hardest time to ease my pain.
Two cups of wine, three sips so light,
How withstand the urgent night?
